content: **this pattern is no longer available on the tsc website ** **size information ** - small medium large xl - finished bust 35 40 45 50 /89 101 5 114 5 127 cm - back length 21 1/2 22 22 1/2 23 1/2 /54 5 56 57 59 5 cm **gauge ** single_crochet chain 5 4 times in pattern = 5 12 5 cm 6 row in mesh pattern = 4 10 cm
